snippet: Mariano Rivera’s pledge to return to the field next year adds another character trait to his already-impressive list: defiance.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column analyzes prospects for New York Yankee Mariano Rivera, who has pledged to return to baseball despite a serious ankle injury; holds that the promise is an example of the 42-year-old pitcher's defiant resilience.
lead_paragraph: Mariano Rivera’s pledge to return to the field next year adds another character trait to his already-impressive list: defiance.

headline.seo: For Rivera, Maestro of Ninth, Injury Is Not Final Symphony
headline.main: For Rivera, Maestro of Ninth, Injury Is Not Final Symphony
headline.print_headline: For Rivera, Maestro of Ninth, Injury Is Not Final Symphony
